definition: US Federal Reserve (Fed), the US central bank
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]

sentences.english: A monetary rule is a requisite for restoring the Fed’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣規則是重建美聯儲獨立性的不二法門。

sentences.english: And that's the reason why the Fed has decided on the second round of its money printing plan.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲何美聯儲決定第二次大開印鈔機的原因。

sentences.english: Trades that sat in opposition to the orgy of money printing by the Fed.
sentences.chinese: 針對美聯儲印鈔狂歡進行的逆向交易值得一提。

sentences.english: Sooner or later the US Treasury and the Fed had to draw the line and the financial sector will eventually be healthier as a result.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲和財政部遲早會出手，最終金融機構也會康復。

sentences.english: And the Federal Reserve reports that banks continue to tighten their lending criteria.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲報告說，銀行的貸款標準會繼續走嚴。

sentences.english: So what’s really motivating the G.O.P. attack on the Fed?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，共和黨攻擊美聯儲的真正動機是什麼？

sentences.english: After all, as Mr. Bernanke has repeatedly said, the Fed can only do so much.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟正如貝南克常言，美聯儲能做的也就這麼多了。

sentences.english: It’s not surprising that arguments against the Fed are finally resonating.
sentences.chinese: 反對美聯儲的呼聲最終獲得了共鳴並不令人感到意外。

sentences.english: Thats part of it. You forgot the Fed and the Dems.
sentences.chinese: 討伐不全面，你有選擇地遺漏了美聯儲和民主黨。

sentences.english: It's no mystery why China and Germany are on the warpath against the Fed.
sentences.chinese: 中國和德國採取行動反對美聯儲毫不奇怪。

sentences.english: The Fed's influence comes about because of its monopolization of the creation of money.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲的力量來自於它壟斷了貨幣的生產。

sentences.english: After deducting operating expenses, the Fed transferred $47.4 billion to the Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 扣除經營費用後，美聯儲把474億美元轉移到庫房。

sentences.english: Fed Governor Warsh is will step down on March 31.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲官員瓦爾許任期將於3月31日到期。

sentences.english: The Fed should always be the calm centre of a financial storm.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲一直都應該是金融災難中最鎮靜的暴風眼。

sentences.english: However the Federal Reserve will not be successful at reinflating the Real Estate bubble.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美聯儲將無法吹起另一個房地產泡沫。

sentences.english: He described the Fed as a type of superhero for financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 他把美聯儲描述成金融市場的超級英雄，無所不能。

definition: hawk faction (opposite: 鸽派, doves)/fierce and combative party/war party/warmongers
